Pro-Line Extra Length Series: Ladder Pull Handle - Back-to-Back, Matte Black Powder Coated Finish, 304 Grade Stainless Steel Alloy

SH-PRO-304-LPH-EXL-B-24-1250

Pro-Line Extra Length Series: Ladder Pull Handle - Back-to-Back, Matte Black Powder Coated Finish, 304 Grade Stainless Steel Alloy

Adding to cart The item has been added

Product details

Description

Strongar Hardware's EXTRA LENGTH back-to-back ladder style door pull handles are suitable for wood, glass, fiberglass and metal doors and are available in multiple designs/finishes that range in length from 24 inches (small) to 84 inches (long/large). Highly-engineered 304 grade materials and beautiful surface finishing allow for installation in outdoor environments such as gates, entry doors, shoplots to indoor environments such as boardrooms, shower glass doors, conference rooms, bathrooms and bedrooms.  

  • Finish: Matte Black Powder Coated 

  • Door Type:  Wood, glass, fiberglass and metal doors

  • Material:  Stainless steel 304 grade

  • Quantity of handles:  One pair (Two handles for a back to back installation)

  • Usage:  Commercial / Residential

  • Application:  Interior and exterior doors

  • Standards:  Provides sufficient clearance (1-1/2" min.) as per ADA requirements for accessibility

  • Customization Requests:  Please contact us at 1-800-259-7254 or email us at info@strongarhardware.com

Note:  Click Here to view our One-Sided Ladder Pulls in all available sizes and finishes.
